<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"OAuth2 Token Endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/oauth2/token"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Exchange authorization code for access token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"grant_type":{"type":"string","example":"authorization_code"},"code":{"type":"string","example":"abcde"},"redirect_uri":{"type":"string","example":"https://example.com"},"client_id":{"type":"string","example":"6c7cf17b-1bd3-47d5-94c6-be2d3570e168"},"client_secret":{"type":"string","example":"6c7cf17b-1bd3-47d5-94c6-be2d3570e168"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully exchanged authorization code for access token","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"access_token":{"type":"string","example":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},"token_type":{"type":"string","example":"Bearer"},"expires_in":{"type":"integer","example":3600},"refresh_token":{"type":"string","example":"def502..."}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request parameters"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
